Smart Binoculars: Binoculars with a built-in camera and Wi-Fi connectivity, allowing users to take photos and videos, and stream live footage directly to their smartphones or tablets.
Night Vision Binoculars: Binoculars with infrared technology, allowing users to see in low-light conditions.
3D Binoculars: Binoculars with a built-in 3D display, allowing users to view objects in 3D.
Virtual Reality Binoculars: Binoculars with a built-in VR headset, allowing users to experience a virtual world while still viewing their surroundings.
